title: New: The Harpoons – Reassurance
content:
The Harpoons are one of those ‘if the world were a fair place these guys would be the biggest band in the world’ acts for me.

Having released one of the tracks of the year a few months back in the form of Do You Want My Love, the Melbourne quartet are back with Reassurance, another dance infused number. There’s a real underlying soulful kick to their music that makes it so downright addictive, almost reminding me of elements on the classic first Disclosure record. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
